description: This file configures the routing for a Vue.js application, defining routes and lazy-loading components.

methods.name: createRouter
methods.description: Initializes a new Vue router instance with specified history mode and route definitions.

methods.name: createWebHistory
methods.description: Creates HTML5 history mode for Vue router, using the base URL from environment variables.

methods.name: import
methods.description: Dynamically loads Vue components for route-based code splitting (lazy loading).
